name: Summer Roguelike Project - Week 5
description:
This is my entry for week 5 of Reddit's Summer Roguelike Tutorial.

Each week, I'll be using Construct 3 to complete the required steps and posting the results here. By the end, I should have a fully-fledged roguelike!

You can follow my progress here on Twitter!

This project is open source! You can download a copy of the Construct 3 file here. (Caution: the code is hot spaghetti). You will need to have these three addons installed in order to view/edit the project.

This week, I focused on: 

  • Tweaking the inventory system.
  • Adding more health/mana items.
  • Adding magic items.
  • Adding level-up items
    • Only "Rage" works so far.

If you have any feedback, feel free to leave it below! See you next week!
